```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE

# setwd("./data_file")
library(tidyverse)
library(BiocManager)
```

We select "F2" gene to make a further study

# gene F2 expression difference in cancer and no cancer samples

boxplot in different samples

```{r}
tpms01A_log2 = read.table(
  "./data_file/tpms01A_log2.txt",
  sep = "\t",
  row.names = 1,
  check.names = F,
  stringsAsFactors = F,
  header = T
)
tpms11A_log2 = read.table(
  "./data_file/tpms11A_log2.txt",
  sep = "\t",
  row.names = 1,
  check.names = F,
  stringsAsFactors = F,
  header = T
)
gene = "BTK"
a = tpms01A_log2[gene, ]
b = tpms11A_log2[gene, ]
a = a |>  t() |>  as.data.frame()
b = b |>  t() |>  as.data.frame()
# write.csv(a, file = "./data_file/F2_01A.csv")
# write.csv(b, file = "./data_file/F2_11A.csv")
a = a |>
  mutate(group = "tumor")
rownames(a) = NULL

b = b |>
  mutate(group = "normal")
rownames(b) = NULL
final = rbind(b, a)

final |> ggplot(aes(x = group, y = F2)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + 
  theme_classic() + 
  labs(title = "F2 expression(TPMS_log2)", x = "group", y = "F2")
```
